title: Nearly half of adults with heart disease can't afford their medical bills

title_detail.value: Nearly half of adults with heart disease can't afford their medical bills

summary: More than 45 percent of non-elderly adults with atherosclerotic cardiovascular disease (ASCVD) report financial hardship due to the associated medical bills. Worse still, about one in five report being unable to pay those medical bills at all, said the researchers.

summary_detail.value: More than 45 percent of non-elderly adults with atherosclerotic cardiovascular disease (ASCVD) report financial hardship due to the associated medical bills. Worse still, about one in five report being unable to pay those medical bills at all, said the researchers.
